column5: Just a heads up, my local Crappy tire has started to reset the fishing section....they have a few bins 50% off full of stuff  I've stopped 3 different times because they keep adding to the pile!  I know there reg price may be a lil higher but at half off some things are worth grabbing. Best part is i use my Canadian tire money to pay for it all, if only my wife hadn't bought that vacuum cleaner with it i coulda grabbed more fishing swag.  The Bins   A few odds and ends I grabbed
I often do very well in the clearance bins at CT.  Nice haul!
I guess I will have to make a stop tomorrow

Are the pics of the clearance bin or your shopping cart? I actually was in CTC Dunnville yesterday and they were stocking the peg boards with hardware and dozens of reels for the locked showcases. I thought I was going to have a panic attack seeing all the goodies. I had to call my sponsor for SIDNA, Stuff I Don't need Anonymous.  It has been such a long winter of looking out the patio door every morning hoping the ice went out on the lake that I was actually drooling over push button Zebcos. It's that bad.  PS, Erie still has ice on it as far as the eye can see this AM. We will need a fiery meteorite to crash in it in order to have open water by spring. Some say " Man you are so lucky to have a lake view" Try looking at ice all day when it should be open water, torture, sheer torture.

I've received a few pm's Sorry to get peoples hopes up, I just wanted to give a heads up in case other CT stores were doing the same thing...This is the Cobourg location  I wish i had of showed the end racks a week or so ago with all the Rapala lures, it's been hit hard. I must confess I held out in hopes of keeping the treasure to myself
I checked one of my local stores today no such luck. Maybe its for the best lol I don't need anything but you know how it is with us tackle junkies

I checked one of my local stores today no such luck. Maybe its for the best lol I don't need anything but you know how it is with us tackle junkies LOL, i past up alota nice stuff, but I couldn't resist going back for another look even tho i didn't really "need" anything

CT north Barrie has loads,from 40%-80% off.Nothing I really need as I just spent a good chunk on lures and plastics,reels as well.lol.Lot of good stuff guys for sure. You need to look through the LARGE BIN.
i know where im going later

Oh Davey  http://www.sail.ca/en/catalogue/camping/heaters/28/m-3s-heater/ Oh what? lol,I have enough heat to heat a house.Lures and plastics,depending what you want,ridiculous prices on some.Just no money left lolol
i know where im going later  No such luck at the Milton location
Pot belly spinners are awesome!  I use the vmc hooks as well for swimming craws, very good hooks!
